io.atomix

Class AtomixClient.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.AtomixClient.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<AtomixClient>
    Enclosing class:
    AtomixClient

    public static class AtomixClient.Builder
extends Object
implements Builder<AtomixClient>
    Builder for programmatically constructing an AtomixClient.

    The client builder configures an AtomixClient to connect to a cluster of ResourceServers. To create a client builder, use the AtomixClient.builder() method. 

       
   Atomix client = AtomixClient.builder(servers)
     .withTransport(new NettyTransport())
     .build();

    • Method Detail

      • withTransport

        public AtomixClient.Builder withTransport(Transport transport)
        Sets the Atomix transport.

        The configured transport should be the same transport as all other nodes in the cluster. If no transport is explicitly provided, the instance will default to the NettyTransport if available on the classpath.

        Parameters:
        transport - The Atomix transport.
        Returns:
        The Atomix builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if transport is null

        public AtomixClient.Builder withSerializer(Serializer serializer)
        Sets the Atomix serializer.

        The serializer will be used to serialize and deserialize operations that are sent over the wire.

        Returns:
        The Atomix builder.
